comments.content: As I can't state what font it is for sure, here some alternatives, not so far from the original: [Purista](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823021335/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/purista), [Nesobrite](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823021335/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/nesobrite) (possibly the closest), [QType FF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823021335/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-qtype), [Orbitron](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823021335/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Orbitron), [Vox](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823021335/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/vox), [Quadrat Grotesk New](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823021335/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/quadrat-grotesk-new)
